Our paper, ["Revisiting the Evidence on Thermostatic Response to Democratic Change: Degrees of Democratic Support or Researcher Degrees of Freedom?"](/publications/published/dem_mood/), has been accepted for publication in [Political Science Research and Methods](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/political-science-research-and-methods).  Great work and congratulations, [Hu](https://sammo3182.github.io/), [Cassandra](https://cassyuehtai.netlify.app/), and [Fred](https://fsolt.org/)!
